patch.author: altinokd@microsoft.com
patch.comment: Return value from worker run functions as part of TargetRun.result object. Encapsulated status and result fields. Added a way to reset WrappedTarget

patch.comment: Bind postMessage when passing into onMessage

patch.author: altinokd@microsoft.com
patch.comment: Do not read config in targetWorker, instead pass CacheOptions as part of workerdata

major.author: kchau@microsoft.com
major.comment: Now takes in a TargetHasher as a dep, but retains its own calls to cache provider

minor.comment: moved caching to happen inside workers

patch.author: kchau@microsoft.com
patch.comment: moving config to its own package

patch.author: kchau@microsoft.com
patch.comment: Making SimpleScheduler more resilient to re-run requests that maybe come from target-graphs that are changing

minor.author: kchau@microsoft.com
minor.comment: adding the ability to have a NoOp Task

patch.author: kchau@microsoft.com
patch.comment: fixed reporter to not log target status when it should not run at all

patch.author: kchau@microsoft.com
patch.comment: fixing profiler so that it will load correctly in the tracing UI

minor.author: kchau@microsoft.com

patch.comment: fixing progress bar to not be a bottleneck

patch.author: kchau@microsoft.com
patch.comment: creating the beginnings of a progress reporter - it's in beta

minor.author: kchau@microsoft.com
minor.comment: adding provision for the run() to pay attention to previous and currently running targetRun's

patch.author: ken@gizzar.com
patch.comment: making swc the transpiler of choice

patch.comment: fixing real imports with rollup as well as getting rid of getPackageAndTask implementation details

patch.comment: fixed the tsconfig.lage2.json to output node16 moduleRes

patch.author: ken@gizzar.com
patch.comment: switching from require() to import() where possible

patch.comment: get rid of third party abort-controller impl

patch.comment: adds import extensions of .js to prepare of esmodule switchover

patch.comment: adds taskArgs param for worker scripts

patch.author: kchau@microsoft.com
patch.comment: account for max worker idle memory limit

patch.author: kchau@microsoft.com
patch.comment: removing sharded targets - not the direction to go with jest support

patch.author: kchau@microsoft.com
patch.comment: uses the separate package for formatting hrtime

patch.comment: Adds a nicer warning message for workers that isn't compatible
